Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel twice ago husband updating found near didnt mind time mixed booked hotel location found hotel updated fault location price 45 stars prepared pay clean actually liked breakfast irish bar hotel location price

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Value”

Reviews.Content: read reviews arriving hotel worried negative honestly pleasantly surprised hotel reasons location hotel brilliant 2 minute walk central station red light district standard reception nice time staff friendly helpful negative view bedroom window building wouldnt stop visiting especially price paid

Reviews.Content: heading amsterdam decided read trip advisor reviews hotel admit worried coming france hotel booked friend majority reviews terrible pleasantly suprised arrived staff day approachable willing help wed forgotten iron travel plugs offered directions advise eat location hotel perfect walking distance five minute walk train station pubs restaurants near shops breakfast pub door average included couldnt complain 10 minutes rld avoid close canal whilst didnt view im staff night inparticular extremley bad mannered rude complaint directly hotel influence returning clean worried low budget central hotel recommend amsterdam travelled boyfriend friends happy hotel late flight home staff kindly held bags walked amsterdam meal liked hotel strongly people ignore bad reviews central cheap hotel wouldnt

Reviews.Content: ok booked hotel marked 4star flight centre website try 1 star hotel filthy floors bedding dirty staff rude smack bang middle red light district paid fortune hotel refund course didnt staying checked hotel victoria park plaz location 4star cheaper

Reviews.Content: budget hotel management aware previous concerns takeover definitely trying listen customers genuine attempts ensure satisfied fantastic breakfast irish pub door dinner bad servings location easy walk central station walk shopping strip additional suitcases management hold returning nights australia

Reviews.Content: spent 4 days hotel tell avoid staying therethe day arrived found razor blade bathroom toilet dirty clean day bought clorine leave night inside morning buttom toilet white suprise wasnt soundproof walking outside view wasnt nice wall building day suprise look below beds found bag chips wasnt ours 1 star hotel hotel breakfasta tavern near hotel location

Reviews.Content: reading reviews bed bugs time wasnt bed mattress protector mattress cleanest breakfast staff helpfull son stayed packers hostel streets week loved maybe time stay quarter price

Reviews.Content: spent 5th 8th october bug pit partner fine normal allergic reaction insect bites bed bugs doctor wasnt chicken pox bite reaction look mange recommend stay cleans matresses maybe hard amsterdam accommodation expensive mediocre times france hotel pleasurable experience stay

Reviews.Content: paid lot money window night moved window disappointed difference picture hotel internet careful detail assure proper spoiled weekend break

Reviews.Content: spend th 20th 25th september hotel stayed third floor window overall clean bathroom clean tv location night fairly quiet allowing rest breakfast humble matresses bit

Reviews.Title: “bed bugs infestation!”
Reviews.Author: 186338Antonia
Reviews.Content: appeared clean staying nights bodies covered extremely itchy red found sort bugs crawling night feel body didnt bothered clean toilet time stayed towels linen rescued tip sound proofed hear corridors streetand charge night weekend shouldnt allowed danger public health

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mathie2100
Reviews.Content: arrived france hotel amsterdam boyfriend stay nights wed looking forward trip time hotel fine okay size clean basement half windows coulndt aircondition didnt didnt expect luxury suite complaning night hotel discovered bugs bed didnt react smashed sleep day found ten biting marks arms bed bugs weve discovered bed night night boyfriend woke middle night jumped bed screaming light theres creeping found 6 bugs bed 4 wall didnt 5 morning looked bed understood bugs guess cleaned dirty reception desk wasnt suit hotel spend rest night cant complain hotel service cleaning hope rid bed bugs 60 itching biting marks spread body thats shame especially im poor teenager payed 300 euros stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “You may as well stay in the red light district hostel”
Reviews.Author: drgirlfriend74
Reviews.Content: firstly hotel front nice canals canal city booked stay hotel paid front stay hotel arrived told wait extra hour check lobby tiny filthy construction outside lobby toilet grim cleaned shoved aside russian witch awful relatives time checked told available visibly upset manager spent entire time mobile left person desk told taxi bring apartment assured nicer wasnt futons bathroom shower door bathroom futons lumpy pillows flatter pancakes location nice actual hotel pay â£75 night sleeping futon â£65 stayed hostel red light district tiny clean towels clean bins day collect keys hairdressers below door alley leave 20 euros deposit refund half total booking site bothered tell apologise cancelled booking location code statement avoid hotel costs unless desparate

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!”
Reviews.Author: Youngtravellor86
Reviews.Content: am writing review little late hopefully people stay hotel booked discounted rate werent expecting hotel basement didnt hotel guest fresh air stunk mould beds disgusting pick prostitute hire hour disgusting werent short money gone hotel unfortunately trip little strapped cash

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location for sightseeing - perfect for a budget city break!”

Reviews.Content: hotel fairly basic shared foldaway bed perfect budget city break fairly clean bathroom beds themselves spotless breakfast irish bar door simple definitely start day hotel definitely location minutes walk centraal station main tourist streets

Reviews.Title: “tourists beware”

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: calabreseboy
Reviews.Content: firstly cab driver didnt exact location id arrived flight told straight walk wasnt pleasing 20 minutes walking rld walking hotels directions finally found pos hotel nestled canal road access gay bar theres wrong bar loud ive traveled lot expect europe comes customer service respect appreciate understand im service australia thats fair finally hotel walked front door guy outside cigarette finish cigarette rough 6 nights hotel checked ive stayed dirty hostels manageable considering price hotel considering price threestar rating terrible firstly spit walls outside blobs spit actual green chunks snot window sense ventilation shower filthy toilet disgusting actually someones leftover lunch float third bed roll set ourselves fine sheets dirty stayed night pos hotel booked park plaza hefty price euro night weekend worth story dont stay france hotel amsterdam prices

Reviews.Title: “Good location but basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bazman10
Reviews.Content: hotel located close dam square central station breakfast ok served irish bar door grubby floors bare bar concrete stench disinfectant cleaning plenty flies pretty basic bed comfortable walls thin hear noise door hotel staff speak english friendly probably stay
